title: Ep. 04 - So Over October w/ LeeAnn Kreischer & Christina P
description: October is finally almost over! LeeAnn Kreischer and Christina P. wrap up this year's Sober October by reflecting on how this year has gone. Tom took a flight lesson Christina isn't too happy about, however, he still maintains his double-title as Sleep AND Recovery Champ! Bert continues his spin classes and not sleeping. Will he make it to 205lbs by the end of the month? Probably not. We also get an update from LeeAnn on firing the her housekeeper!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
